thread.title: L Brands Raises Outlook

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: L Brands Raises Outlook
text:
L Brands Inc. again raised its per-share earnings guidance for the year as the company reported earnings rose 7.5% on continued sales growth and stronger margins in the latest quarter.
For the year ending in January, the owner of brands including Victoriaâ€™s Secret and Bath & Body Works now expects per-share earnings of $3.58 to $3.73, compared with its recently increased estimate for per-share profit of $3.50 to $3.70.
